justification: Ignores Team B’s conservative, injury-averse profile and preference for pocket passers/possession WRs. Asks them to downgrade from healthy Tier 2 QB (Foster) to Tier 3 (Hall) and take on an injured, high-variance WR (Nelson), which conflicts with their values. The claim to “add steady WR” is incorrect—A would receive Lucas Allen (out, Tier 5). Only coherent element is A fixing QB bye overlap. Rationale is generic and misaligned with B’s incentives.
